statements: SELECT * FROM user_account_balance WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM user_account_balance WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_balance FROM user_account_balance GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_account_balance ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM user_account_balance
SELECT * FROM user_account_balance WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_balance FROM user_account_balance GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 1000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM user_account_balance GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM user_account_balance GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM user_account_balance GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) as total_transactions FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) as largest_transaction FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 500 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM user_accounts JOIN transaction_logs ON user_accounts.user_id = transaction_logs.user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM user_accounts JOIN transaction_logs ON user_accounts.user_id = transaction_logs.user_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS highest_transaction_amount FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY highest_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_accounts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, balance, timestamp FROM balance_history ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_accounts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_balance DESC
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM balance_history WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5
SELECT * FROM balance_changes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM balance_changes WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, transaction_date FROM balance_changes ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM balance_changes WHERE id = 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM balance_changes WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM balance_changes WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM balance_changes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT t.user_id, u.username, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY t.user_id, u.username;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT type_id, type_name FROM transaction_types WHERE type_name LIKE '%transfer%';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE action = 'login' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.user_id, t.amount, l.old_balance, l.new_balance, t.timestamp FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_log l ON t.transaction_id = l.transaction_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.balance, t.amount, t.timestamp FROM user_accounts u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
